snippet: States are flouting federal law by refusing to process benefits of same-sex spouses in the National Guard.
abstract: Editorial criticizes National Guard units in Texas, Mississippi, Louisiana, Oklahoma, Georgia, Florida, South Carolina and West Virginia for defying Defense Sec Chuck Hagel's order that same-sex spouses of military personnel be given full spousal and family benefits; urges Hagel to consider transferring federal dollars, equipment and National Guard work assignments to bases in other states if they persist in their defiance of federal law.
lead_paragraph: States are flouting federal law by refusing to process benefits of same-sex spouses in the National Guard.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
